title: Optimization and inflection of f(x)=ln(2+sinx) part - b

content.description: Let f be the function defined by f(x)=ln(2+sinx) for π≤x≤2π .
content.question: Find the x-coordinate of each inflection point on the graph of f. Justify your answer.

frqParts.text: Find the x-coordinate of each inflection point on the graph of f. Justify your answer.

topic.text: 5.6: Determining Concavity of Functions over Their Domains

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Describe the relationships among different representations of functions and their derivatives.
